column1: fitting factors for reactions linspaces (1 line per delta value that you want to change
column2: line contains the following arguments to create the linspace): start

column1: Assuming that the indexing of lines in this file starts at 1 (it does for me in VS Code on Windows 10)
column2: the values for a linspace on line n are used to create a linspace whose values

column1: appear in fitting_factor_combination[n - 3] (where fitting_factor_combination is an array containing a combination of values (one from each of the linspaces))
